participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Caring and sociable, enjoys sharing experiences with friends and has a passion for music.
participant_1.background: I'm going to a local Christmas concert with my friend, even though I can't sing very well. My collection of rocks and minerals calms me down. I'm allergic to apples yet still eat them. I like to wake up to the smell of fresh-brewed coffee. I am a security guard who enjoys driving my Ford truck to work.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Friendly and family-oriented, enjoys fitness and spending quality time with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I'm not married, but I'm very close with my nieces and nephews. I work from home, and it allows me to spend a lot of time with my dog. I like to go to tailgate parties with my friends and listen to Jacob Sartorius. I'm going to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike. My first purchase was a journal that I would fill with my thoughts and reflections.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I'm good! Just got done working out, getting ready to watch Magic Mike.
Oh nice, sounds like a fun night. I'm going to a Christmas concert with my friend, even though I can't sing very well.
That sounds fun too! I love Christmas concerts. Do you have a favorite song?
I love O Holy Night, it's so beautiful. How about you?
I love anything by Pentatonix, they're so good.
They are! I love their cover of Hallelujah.
Me too, that's one of my favorite songs. What do you do for work?
I'm a security guard, I work nights so I get to sleep in.
Oh nice, I work from home so I get to spend a lot of time with my dog.
That sounds awesome, what kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy, he's the best dog ever.
Aww, golden retrievers are so cute
